description: Try our easy to follow Mulgowie Microwavable Cleaned & Cut Green Beans With Dressing recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Steamed vegetable,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Egg free,Sesame free,Halal,Microwave,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Mulgowie Microwavable Cleaned & Cut Green Beans With Dressing Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cook beans in a saucepan of boiling water for 2 to 3 minutes or until tender. Alternatively, simply open microwavable bag and microwave beans in the bag for 4-5 minutes.
Place parsley, vinegar and oil in a jar and shake to combine.
Place beans in a serving bowl and drizzle with the balsamic dressing. Beans can be served as a main or as an accompaniment to any meal.
